description: On the day of your 16th birthday, your mum kicks you out of home for good. You live in a car. You sofa surf. You sleep rough. Life for these young people has been tough with many challenges. Here they tell their stories in their own words, reveal they have learnt about how to survive and make plans for putting their lives back together.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002794; Britain's First Light; Active; 2013
